title: Nick Scarpino Takes Over Game Showdown
description:
Nick cut the power and stole our most popular show from Blessing. 

From this episode of Game Shodown: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ki0MFI2KIiM&t=255s&pp=ygUNZ2FtZSBzaG93ZG93bg%3D%3D

transcript_chunks.text: we've heard your cries from last week's episode and this week there will be no Shenanigans thank God get ready for game [Music] Showdown [ __ ] no no no welcome to game Showdown ladies and gentlemen I'm your host Nick scarpino and I'm going to be joined today by Tim Gettys team blue snowbike Mike Howard stepping in for one Andy Court best purple and Greg Miller rounding out the trio excited to see you there excited to see you too as I wrote these questions I thought W this is going to be a little one-sided but we're going to have some fun ladies and gentlemen [ __ ] we of course starting off this is going to be the entertainment Edition I just want you guys to know that absolutely zero video game questions all movie questions and spoilers most of them are about the movie The Heat we're going to start off with a trivia question worth 10 points and the chance to go first in kind of Beauty Buzz in an buzz in to answer you guys ready get your hands ready you look great today Nick you look
